title: what if avicus had the minigame spleef

replies.body: When you say Avicus one would normally mean the whole community but when you say "Avicus doesn't like spleef" that becomes an incorrect statement because I like spleef, I actually love running around trying to break blocks under people, besides how pointless it seems.
replies.body_tagged: When you say Avicus one would normally mean the whole community but when you say "Avicus doesn't like spleef" that becomes an incorrect statement because I like spleef, I actually love running around trying to break blocks under people, besides how pointless it seems.

replies.body:
The OP confused me, but I'll base my reply on the title.
Unless FunkyIvy can code a unique spleef minigame from normal spleef, I doubt that spleef will ever see its face as a minigame on Avicus. I wouldn't mind spleef being added in, however.
replies.body_tagged:
The OP confused me, but I'll base my reply on the title.
Unless FunkyIvy can code a unique spleef minigame from normal spleef, I doubt that spleef will ever see its face as a minigame on Avicus. I wouldn't mind spleef being added in, however.
